bug.author: ggezer
bug.summary: Too many EventLoops increase netty footprint
bug.description: Alluxio Version: 2.0+ Describe the bug Alluxio allows an event-loop per physical connection. This has 2 issues: 1- Event-loop will leak if the connection is not properly released. 2- It gives an inefficient use underlying netty architecture. To Reproduce Don't close FileSystems. Expected behavior Event-loops for clients should be unified per category. Namely a DEFAULT event-loop and STREAMING event-loop.
